name: Copse Village Clicker
description:
Your workers are trying to establish a village in the middle of nowhere and need your help. They have an increasing list of daily needs that need to be met, and if you manage to survive til day 30, you win.

____________________________________________________________________

Upgrades:
-Tool increases amount per task done.
-Assistant passively gives some resources every hour.
-Buildings increase the effectiveness of both your task and the assistants.
